AdminUser.title: AdminUser
AdminUser.description: Represents an administrative user with login credentials.

id.description: Unique identifier for the admin user.

email.description: Email address of the admin user.

googleId.description: Google ID of the admin user if signed in with Google.

ParticipantUser.title: ParticipantUser
ParticipantUser.description: Represents a participant user identified by a unique code.

id.description: Unique identifier for the participant user.

participantCode.description: Unique code assigned to the participant user for login.

GameState.title: GameState
GameState.description: Represents the state of the game for a specific user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the game state entry.

archiveComplete.description: Indicates if the Archive storyline is complete.

wellComplete.description: Indicates if the Mechanical Well storyline is complete.

networkComplete.description: Indicates if the Shrouded Network storyline is complete.

archiveKey.description: Indicates if the ECHOSPIRE key fragment has been collected.

wellKey.description: Indicates if the PULSAR-LINEAGE key fragment has been collected.

networkKey.description: Indicates if the AURELION-PRIME key fragment has been collected.

Material.title: Material
Material.description: Represents a printable material for a game room.

storagePath.description: Path to the file in Firebase Storage.

phase.description: Optional game phase this material is for.

printed.description: Whether the material has been printed.

Hint.title: Hint
Hint.description: Represents a single hint for a puzzle, intended for admin use.

puzzleKey.description: Identifier for the puzzle this hint belongs to.

team.description: The team this hint is intended for ('global' for all teams).

order.description: The progressive order of the hint (e.g., 1 for the first, gentle hint).

revealedFor.description: An array of team IDs that have received this hint.

TeamHint.title: TeamHint
TeamHint.description: A hint that has been explicitly revealed to a specific team by an admin.

teamId.description: The ID of the team that should see this hint.

puzzleKey.description: Identifier for the puzzle this hint belongs to.

/admins/{adminId}.description: Stores admin user information. Only authenticated admins can read/write their own data.

/participants/{participantId}.description: Stores participant user information. Only someone with the correct code can read the data.

/participants/{participantId}/gameState/.description: Stores the game state for each participant. The participant ID is included in each gameState document, ensuring data access is restricted to the appropriate participant.

/games/{gameId}/materials/{materialId}.description: Stores printable materials associated with a specific game. Admins can read and update these materials.

/games/{gameId}/hints/{hintId}.description: Stores all master hints for a game. Only admins can read or modify these.

/games/{gameId}/teamHints/{teamHintId}.description: Stores hints that have been revealed to specific teams by an admin. Players can only read hints intended for their team.
